item.title: Raichur City Corporation bags State-level Best Performance Award
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Raichur City Corporation has been selected for the State-level Best Performance Award under the Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana-National Urban Livelihoods Mission (DAY-NULM) for its outstanding implementation of livelihood and self-help group initiatives.
In a communication issued by the Director of the National Livelihoods Mission, Raichur City Corporation Commissioner Jubin Mohapatra was congratulated on behalf of select self-help groups.
After assessing the performance of self-help groups ac...]]>
